title: Blocking Traffic
summary: Prohibits stopping or parking in a way that interferes with the movement of traffic.

title: Interference with Snow Clearing
summary: Prohibits stopping a vehicle in a way that interferes with snow clearing or the application of sand/salt.

title: Interference with Highway Cleaning
summary: Prohibits stopping a vehicle in a way that interferes with street cleaning operations.

title: Double Parking
summary: Prohibits stopping or parking a vehicle alongside another stopped or parked vehicle on the roadway.

title: Stopping on Bridges or Tunnels
summary: Prohibits stopping a vehicle on a bridge, elevated structure, tunnel, or underpass.

title: Stopping on or Adjacent to a Median Strip
summary: Prohibits stopping a vehicle on a highway median strip or adjacent to it.

title: Blocking Crosswalks or Intersections
summary: Prohibits stopping or parking a vehicle in a way that obstructs pedestrian crosswalks or road intersections.

title: Stopping Near a Pedestrian Crossover
summary: Prohibits stopping a vehicle within 30 meters before or 15 meters after a pedestrian crossover.
